item.title: Deku Tree

item.title: Dodongo's Cavern
item.description: Dodongo’s Cavern Optimal routing Full clear Go mode 1F Main chamber Light eyes with chus Stairs room Bring down the stairs without bombs Corridor Skulltula without Pierre or Hookshot King Dodongo Two-cycles with Bombs Three-cycles with Strength Two-cycles Chus
